title: PM felicitates Shibli, his team on voting machines
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 8 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Sunday congratulated Minister for Science and Technology Shibli Faraz and his team over indigenously made electronic voting machines.
On his twitter handle, the prime minister, referring to his recent inspection of Pakistani-made electronic voting machines by the ministry of science & technology, posted “Looks like finally we will have elections in Pakistan where all contestants will accept the results.”
Inspecting Pakistani-made electronic voting machines by our Science &  Technology Ministry. Looks like finally we will have elections in Pakistan where all contestants will accept the results . Congratulations to Shibli Faraz and his team. pic.twitter.com/9UySGvhiU0
— Imran Khan (@ImranKhanPTI) August 8, 2021
